main.name: Aparna Krishnan
main.description: I am a front-end developer with academic interests in Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing. Also, hit me up if you want to play FPS games!
main.bio: I am a self-described tech geek who also plays FPS games with extremely average skill. I'm a front-end developer and UI designer, and am always looking for cool projects to collaborate on.

Courses Learned: Physics, Chemistry, Maths, Computer Science

work.title: Software Development Engineer - Intern
work.description: A React internship to develop features for a store creation and management application.

work.title: Software Engineer - Intern
work.description: Worked on the client interface of the cloud optimization service. Introduced new features for easy tracking of asset usage for the clients. Used AngularJS to resolve certain issues that the clients previously had with the interface, and also to program other features.

work.title: Special Needs Mentor - Intern
work.description: An immersive programming tutoring internship. Worked as an HTML/CSS programming tutor for teens and adults with special needs. Was responsible for one-on-one tutoring sessions and also for developing the special IDE used by the institution for coaching the students.

work.title: Software Engineer - Student Intern
work.description: An Android app development internship where I worked on a cloud-based energy-metering project. Was responsible for developing the Android application that controlled the energy-metering device.
